original_title: Flammender Pfeil im Reiche der schnellen Bilder
overview: We are put in a world where television has complete power. "Flaming Arrow", the hero of the film, is the only one among the masses of TV dependent people who still knows genuine feelings. We feel with him. He takes up the fight against the power of the media. He meets with the same problems as we do: to recognize what is reality and what is film.
title: Flaming Arrow in the Realm of Speedy Pictures
